pr_title: Fix #1148 #1149 - API level throttling issues in distributed setup

timeline.message: Fix #1148 #1149 - API level throttling issues in distributed setup
Fix #1141 - Support basic auth with sha256 and above hashing

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't look good. This makes the [DONE] printed in next line which is not professional at all IMO. Earlier we had few difficulties in printing this in one line but I fixed it recently in one of my PRs. If we need to print warn messages then the best option is to keep all messages in a list and print those after the build command execution, in the Main.java
timeline.author: praminda

replies.bodyText: If any of the options doesn't work my opinion is we should remove the half bakedGenerating sources message completely from the build output.
replies.author: praminda

timeline.message: Fix #1113 - Allow x-wso2-basePath to be template with version
